ğŸ“š Weekend Journal Reminder

Hi everyone! ğŸ˜Š

As you work on your weekend journals, please take a moment to think carefully about your structure, grammar, and content. Here are some tips to help you write a strong entry:

Focus on one interesting event from your weekend. Donâ€™t try to write about everythingâ€”choose something that really stands out to you.
Use past tense since you are writing about something that already happened.
Include a clear opening (introduce your event) and a closing statement (wrap up your thoughts or feelings about it).
Make it interesting for the reader! Share details, your feelings, or something funny or surprising.
Take your time and write thoughtfully. Iâ€™m excited to read about your weekend adventures! âœ¨
